name: C. Gonzalez
text: Good pizza and I like how they encourage young children to read with the book it program

name: michael gorbichov
text: THERE IS A REASON THIS PIZZA HUT LOOKS RUN DOWN. AVOID IF POSSIBLE. Absolutely terrible, stood there waiting in the lobby for 20 minutes WHILE MY PIZZA WAS DONE IN THE HEATING RACK. Got home and it was nice and dry. Incompetent staff with the worst customer service I have ever experienced, didnâ€™t even apologize.

name: That weird youtube kid
text: This was an amazing experience but only one waitress was busting her but if while the other ones were just sitting there. I loved the service though. I give the lady a 5 star but not the ones that were sitting in the back.

name: yendor 187
text: Order online got here its a wait with nobody in here. One guy ahead of me.

name: Brandon Gajewski
text: Closest Pizza Hut to my house, and with some deals I order pizza from here carry out. Every time it says 15-20 minutes. I leave my house 20 minutes after, get to the store, and the pizza isnâ€™t ready. End up having to wait 15 to 20 more â€¦More

name: Dawn
text: Best thin crust ever!! Got the Chicken Bacon Parmesan as a thin crust and it was phenomenal. I ordered carry out and the girl who took my order was extremely helpful, friendly and nice, she even went out of her way to find a coupon for me to use. This will definitely become our new go to pizza place!

name: Tim
text: Great service and great food. The waitress  Marla was extremely nice and very attentive. We got a cheesy bites pizza... It was AMAZING! We were there on a Sunday afternoon and it was not busy at all. We have ordered delivery also, they delivered the pizza with a smile!

name: Christie Strieter
text: Hands down the best pizza place ever!! Pizza hut is making it's come back!!!! Lindsay is an amazing fun outgoing server, excellent service and great with kids!!! Food was hot and fast!! Will be back to this location!!!

name: Kenshin Himura
text: Service is non-existent. Sat down for fine in and nobody came to my table to ask my order. Store was not busy and only had 2 other customers dining in. Waited for over 5 minutes and nobody came to my table so I walked out. I won't be back

name: Thomas Zoldos
text: Pizza was just ok. Bread sticks were soggy. We placed on online order and tried applying a coupon code that we had from the web. The code was rejected, so I asked about it in the store. The girl at the register said: "I don't know anything â€¦More

name: Juliana Missinne
text: So very angry! TERRIBLE SERVICE! Order a to go order... they said it would take 10-15 minutes... been waiting over an hour and still not done yet. They wouldnâ€™t do anything either for the inconvenience. They also had mentioned they had no more dough. What pizza place this slow doesnâ€™t have dough?

name: Kishan Chudasama
text: This probably has to be the absolute worst pizza hut around, they have messed up my orders almost every signal time or have missed an item every time. Placed an order for a pizza with a free ultimate cookie and the "manager" said he â€¦More

name: christe bellow
text: What a dump. Poor service. Cold food, cheese wasn't melted. Sausage on the pizza and I don't eat sausage. Told the manager and she pretty much said sorry and didn't offer a discount or anything. I left without eating.

name: Cory Lutz
text: Every time I try to order from them they can never deliver with the same excuses that there driver called in.

name: Ryan Sheridan
text: Did dine in lunch, 5 dollar deals. Staff was super friendly, food was good. Pop seemed very watered down.Pizza, bread sticks and pasta were good.

name: Kristofer Golbiw
text: Nice and clean, but Pizza Hut just doesn't do it for me anymore. The sauce is tasty

name: Sarah Zimmermann
text: Marla could not have been more EXCELLENT!!!! Her service with a smile and cheerful attitude, as well as the tasty pizza made this the perfect lunch :)

name: Eleanor POOLE
text: Fresh made..hot pizza...very pleasant young lady waited on me

name: Anthony Lane
text: Ordered for carryout.  We arrived at the time they said it would be ready, and were told that they lost our order.  Sat in the waiting room for about an hour and the pizza still wasn't ready.  The fate of our pizza remains uncertain (we gave up and left), but one thing is for sure: we will never be visiting this Pizza Hut again.

name: Richard M Maloney
text: I had very good service and the pizza sappream was very delicious. The price was right also.

name: Jillian Castillo
text: DON'T EVER order your pizza from here!!! It took THREE hours for them to deliver my pizza! I understand they we're busy but three hours!?? That's ridiculous! I will never order from or eat here again!!!

name: Remi Nicole
text: I ordered ahead of time and showed up on time yet STILL waited for 40 minutes. Completely unacceptable. Especially because it was so insanely slow.

name: Chris Burns
text: not crowded.  food is great!

name: Chad Rogers
text: Service is always awful at this location. Long waits for carryout, I always seem to remind them of forgotten items, like a side of sauce. Quality is hit or miss, I once ordered 2 pan styles but they were half the height they should've been â€¦More

name: jean lynne
text: The bread sticks had too much garlic butter on top, they were a bit soggy on top and too crunchy on the bottom.  The pizza crust was off as well.  I think it didn't rise right.  We didn't have the time to Wait for a return and to get a new one.

name: kinner tripathi
text: Awesome place to eat a delicious pizza.

name: G. Quick
text: Slow service but good pizza....order take out

name: Matthew Fleury
text: The pizza was sweet like cake, and everything tasted like fake chemicals.  Service was ridiculously slow.  I will not be returning.

name: Sue h
text: Service was terrible.. We ate in. Had to ask for more drink.. Had to ask for napkins. Had to ask for to go boxes. The waitress also went in deep detail about her kid she lost custody of.. Her past life.. "Like, kno wahmsayin.." Over & over.. I wanted to run!

name: Perry Bailey
text: Nice and quiet place for pizza in a busy area. Need to bring back the salad bar.

name: Sandra Hamilton
text: Very disappointed. From the minute we stepped in the door, lengthy wait for everything. NO hustle from the staff. Sorry I had to give 1 star to post....

text: those guys make a very delicious pizza.

name: Thomas Mercer
text: They jipped on bread sticks had no ranch and manager was rude will.never come.back to this location agian

name: Ariel Dudeck
text: Always super friendly and super fast!

name: Cory Franzel
text: no delivery driver on a friday night? lol thats pathetic, good luck staying open:)

name: Paige Walters
text: I've never had a problem with this Pizza Hut in particular, and any problems have been fixed as soon as they were noticed, along with some extra. I've been going here for years, and it has always been the same. As another post said "some of â€¦More

name: Daniel Grzywinski
text: Ordered that Cheesy Crust Pizza (TV commercial) on 12-09, asked for extra cheese and pepperoni and wasn't given either and each slice had about 2 pieces of pepperoni, cheese was very light and they had scattered hamburger on it. Depressing. Won't be back at that particular one for sure! :-(

name: Brian Hofer
text: Wife can't get enough of the Hut! Overall, the pan pizza is still one of my faves as well. Pizza Hut as a whole, just doesn't seem to be what it used to be though.
